teameleven.smartbells2.create

Class CreateRoutine

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • teameleven.smartbells2.create.CreateRoutine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnClickListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class CreateRoutine
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
implements android.view.View.OnClickListener
    CreateRoutine class makes a Routine of Exercises(Set Group) Created by Jarret on 2015-10-05. Update by WonKyoung on 2015-10-10 Update by WonKyoung on 2015-10-25 Update by WonKyoung On 2015-11-05 updated: Oct 8th, 2015 : added methods to interact with Exercise and Routine for Routine saving and creation.
